767910.name: Strange Night ll
767910.description:
A brutal crime at a hostel in the small town of Passo Fundo has left the population in fear. The local police have never encountered a case like this before. Investigators discovered signs of possible rituals, strange symbols scrawled on the walls, and cloth dolls, but nothing that leads to a solution.

As the police attempt to unravel the mystery, you’ve been hired as a night watchman to keep curious journalists and thrill-seekers from invading the site. On your first night, it can be stressful trying to stay awake while making periodic rounds and sipping coffee, as your shift promises to be long and filled with strange occurrences.

Features

  • CCTV System: Monitor specific areas from the security of your room.

  • Motion Sensor Alerts: If nothing appears on the cameras, don’t worry; the motion sensor will alert you to any suspicious movements, allowing you to decide whether to investigate.

  • Immersive Graphics and Audio: High-quality graphics create a detailed environment to explore, while immersive audio enhances the atmospheric horror experience.

All doors are open—come in and explore wherever you want, but remember, you are responsible for your own safety.

Warning: This game contains jump scares.
767910.supported_languages:
英语*, 简体中文, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
